mapper.select: SELECT MAR_ID as marId, COUNT(*) OVER() AS count from tbl_market GROUP BY MAR_ID ORDER by MAR_ID
SELECT GUNAME guname from TBL_MARKET GROUP BY GUNAME ORDER by GUNAME
SELECT REQUEST_ITEM as requestItem from tbl_REQUEST_ITEM GROUP BY REQUEST_ITEM

select REQUEST_IDX as idx ,CUSTOMER_IDX as customerIdx ,REQUEST_TITLE as title ,REQUEST_ITEM as items ,REQUEST_MEMO as memo ,REQUEST_RECEIVE_TIME as receiveTime ,REQUEST_TIME as time ,REQUEST_FLAG as flag ,GUNAME_MARID as gunameMarid from tbl_request where REQUEST_IDX = #{idx}

SELECT a.product_Idx productIdx, a.sel_Idx selIdx, a.tag_Idx tagIdx, a.product_Event productEvent, a.product_Name productName, a.product_Origin productOrigin, a.product_Price productPrice, a.product_Info productInfo, a.product_Like productLike, a.product_Package productPackage, b.product_Img productImg, b.product_Img_UUID productImgUUID
FROM TBL_PRODUCT a, tbl_product_img b
WHERE a.guname_marid = #{gunamemarid} AND a.PRODUCT_STATUS = 1 AND a.product_Idx = b.product_Idx AND rownum < 11 ORDER BY a.PRODUCT_LIKE desc

SELECT b.REQUEST_REPLY_IDX as replyIdx ,b.REQUEST_IDX as requestIdx ,b.SEL_IDX as selIdx ,b.REQUEST_REPLY_REPLY as replys ,b.REQUEST_REPLY_FLAG as replyFlag ,b.REQUEST_REPLY_TIME as replyTime ,a.SEL_STORE as selStore ,a.SEL_ADDRESS as selAddress ,a.SEL_INFO as selInfo ,a.SEL_LIKE as selLike ,a.GUNAME_MARID as guNameMarId ,c.SEL_IMG_UUID as selImgUUID
FROM TBL_SELLER a, TBL_REQUEST_REPLY b, TBL_SELLER_IMG c WHERE b.REQUEST_IDX = #{idx} AND REQUEST_DELETE_REPLY_FLAG > 0 AND a.sel_idx = b.SEL_IDX AND c.SEL_IDX = b.SEL_IDX ORDER BY b.REQUEST_REPLY_IDX
SELECT guname_marid gunameMarid FROM TBL_MARKET WHERE mar_idx = #{marIdx}

SELECT rn, idx, title, items, memo, receiveTime, time, flag, gunameMarid, customerIdx, deleteFlag, replyCnt, total, memberId, lag(idx,1) OVER (ORDER BY rn) AFTER, lead(idx,1) OVER (ORDER BY rn) BEFORE FROM ( SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_request pk_request) */ ROWNUM rn, REQUEST_IDX idx, REQUEST_TITLE title, REQUEST_ITEM items, REQUEST_MEMO memo, REQUEST_RECEIVE_TIME receiveTime, REQUEST_TIME time, REQUEST_FLAG flag, GUNAME_MARID gunameMarid, CUSTOMER_IDX customerIdx, REQUEST_DELETE_FLAG deleteFlag, REPLY_CNT replyCnt, COUNT(request_idx) over() total, MEMBER_ID memberId FROM TBL_REQUEST WHERE request_idx > 0 AND REQUEST_DELETE_FLAG = 1
AND REQUEST_TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND REQUEST_MEMO like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND GUNAME_MARID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND ROWNUM <= (((ceil(#{page}/10)*100)+1)+1)
) WHERE rn >= ((#{page} * 10) - 10) AND rn <= ((#{page} * 10)+1)

SELECT rn, idx, title, items, memo, receiveTime, time, flag, gunameMarid, customerIdx, deleteFlag, replyCnt, total, memberId, lag(idx,1) OVER (ORDER BY rn) AFTER, lead(idx,1) OVER (ORDER BY rn) BEFORE FROM ( SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_request pk_request) */ ROWNUM rn, REQUEST_IDX idx, REQUEST_TITLE title, REQUEST_ITEM items, REQUEST_MEMO memo, REQUEST_RECEIVE_TIME receiveTime, REQUEST_TIME time, REQUEST_FLAG flag, GUNAME_MARID gunameMarid, CUSTOMER_IDX customerIdx, REQUEST_DELETE_FLAG deleteFlag, REPLY_CNT replyCnt, COUNT(request_idx) over() total, MEMBER_ID memberId FROM TBL_REQUEST WHERE request_idx > 0 and GUNAME_MARID = #{gunameMarid} AND REQUEST_DELETE_FLAG = 1
AND REQUEST_TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND MEMBER_ID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND REQUEST_MEMO like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND GUNAME_MARID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND ROWNUM <= (((Ceil(#{page}/10)*100)+1)+1)
) WHERE rn >= ((#{page} * 10) - 10) AND rn <= ((#{page} * 10)+1)
